techmeme.title: Filing: Apple seeks to pause the part of the April 30 US federal court ruling that blocked it from charging App Store commissions on outside transactions (Bloomberg)
WisdomAI, which offers AI-powered data analytics from structured, unstructured, and "dirty" data, launches with a $23M seed led by Coatue Ventures (Julie Bort/TechCrunch)
TPG and Corpay agree to acquire Charlotte, NC-based AvidXchange, a payment automation software provider, for $2.2B, with Corpay investing ~$500M for a 33% stake (Reuters)
Samsung plans to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge at a May 12 virtual event at 8pm ET, and reservations for the super-slim device are now open with a $50 credit (Ben Schoon/9to5Google)
At Stripe Sessions, the company announced an AI foundation model for payments, plans for stablecoin-powered accounts, a recent migration with Nvidia, and more (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
